abstract: Study finds that Unilever ads tailored for `Mad Men’ improved attitudes about the company’s brands.
snippet: Study finds that Unilever ads tailored for `Mad Men’ improved attitudes about the company’s brands.
lead_paragraph: A series of commercials for six big Unilever brands, which appeared during — and were inspired by — the AMC series “Mad Men” were successful, according to the results of a study.

headline.main: Unilever’s ‘Mad Men’ Spots Worked, Study Says
